__prompts__.project_name: Enter a human-readable name for the project
__prompts__.project_slug: Enter a name for the Python package
__prompts__.project_description: Enter a brief description of the project
__prompts__.author: Enter your full name
__prompts__.packaging: Select the Python packaging tool you wish to use
__prompts__.mkdocs: Whether to provide a skeleton for documentation, using MkDocs and publishing on GitHub Pages
__prompts__.use_bsd3_licence: Whether to use Imperial's default open-source licence (BSD 3-clause)
__prompts__.add_precommit_workflows: Add Github Actions to run pre-commit hooks (only needed for private repositories)
__prompts__.use_windows_ci_runner: Add a GitHub Actions runner for Windows (needed if your software targets Windows)
__prompts__.use_macos_ci_runner: Add a GitHub Actions runner for macOS (needed if your software targets macOS - ARM)
__prompts__.automerge_bot_prs: Whether to automatically merge PRs from bots including dependabot
